paper_abstract: In this paper checkpointing and rollback-recovery protocol rVsMW for mobile systems is presented. The protocol preserves Monotonic Writes session guarantee required by clients, despite failures of servers. The costs of rollback-recovery are minimized, by exploiting semantics of operations and properties of MW guarantee. The proof of safety property of rVsMW is included.
paper_title: Safety of recovery protocol preserving MW session guarantee in mobile systems
